prompt-state.msg: Choose an identity

value.title: 419: Amoral Scammer
value.text: The first time the Corp installs a card each turn, you may expose that card unless the Corp pays 1[credit].

value.title: Armand "Geist" Walker: Tech Lord
value.text: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, draw 1 card.

value.title: Az McCaffrey: Mechanical Prodigy
value.text: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.

value.title: Barry "Baz" Wong: Tri-Maf Veteran
value.text: Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, you may install 1 resource or piece of hardware from your grip.

value.title: Gabriel Santiago: Consummate Professional
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].

value.title: Iain Stirling: Retired Spook
value.text: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit] if the Corp has more scored agenda points than you.

value.title: Ken "Express" Tenma: Disappeared Clone
value.text: The first time each turn you play a run event, gain 1[credit].

value.title: Khan: Savvy Skiptracer
value.text: The first time you pass a piece of ice each turn, you may install an icebreaker from your hand, lowering the install cost by 1.

value.title: Laramy Fisk: Savvy Investor
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, you may force the Corp to draw 1 card.

value.title: Leela Patel: Trained Pragmatist
value.text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.

value.title: Liza Talking Thunder: Prominent Legislator
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, draw 2 cards and take 1 tag.

value.title: Los: Data Hijacker
value.text: The first time the Corp rezzes a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].

value.title: Mercury: Chrome Libertador
value.text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card. Use this ability only once per turn.

value.title: MuslihaT: Multifarious Marketeer
value.text: When your turn begins, look at the top card of your stack. If that card is an icebreaker or a run event, you may reveal it and add it to your grip.

value.title: Nero Severn: Information Broker
value.text: Once per turn, you may jack out when you encounter a sentry.

value.title: Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta: Symphonic Prodigy
value.text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you dont have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain [click].

value.title: Silhouette: Stealth Operative
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, you may expose 1 card.

value.title: Steve Cambridge: Master Grifter
value.text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.

value.title: Zahya Sadeghi: Versatile Smuggler
value.text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
